login.title: Login

register.title: Register
register.filedisclaimer: Image must be PNG or JPG and less than {{size}}MB in size
register.existingemail: The email address is already in use

recover.title: Recover password
recover.instructions: Enter the email address linked to your account
recover.disclaimer: If the address belongs to an existing account, an email will be sent with instructions for recovering your password.
recover.success: Request received! If the address is valid, an email will arrive shortly.
recover.wrongexplained: This link is invalid. If you still need to change your password, try again from the login screen
recover.changedinstructions: Please log in to continue using the site.

verifyemail.title: Email verification
verifyemail.pleaselogin: Please, log in into your account to use the site.
verifyemail.instructions: This link is invalid. Please, register again if you don't have an account.

mycontracts.pickdate: Select a new date and time for the appointment

rate.header: How would you rate your experience with this service?
rate.tellusplaceholder: Write about the quality of the job, how you were treated, etc.
rate.summarize: Summarize your experience in a short phrase (optional)

reviewreschedule.disclaimer: If you accept the rescheduling, you won't be able to reschedule again. If you reject it, the contract will be cancelled

cancel.title: Are you sure that you want to cancel this contract?

reject.title: Are you sure that you want to reject this contract?

reschedule.title: Are you sure that you want to reschedule this contract?
reschedule.message: This action may only be performed once per contract

contractstate.nocontractssubtitleclient: Hire a service to see your contracts here
contractstate.nocontractssubtitlepro: When one of your services is hired, a contract will appear here
contractstate.noactivecontractssubtitle: Once a contract is approved by the professional, it will be displayed right here
contractstate.noactivecontractssubtitlepro: Once you accept a contract request, the contract will be shown right here
contractstate.nopendingcontractsheader: No pending approval contracts to show
contractstate.nopendingcontractssubtitle: All newly hired services will appear in this section, until it gets approved or rejected by the professional
contractstate.nopendingcontractssubtitlepro: Once you are hired contracts will be displayed here, waiting for your approval
contractstate.nofinalizedontractssubtitle: All finalized and cancelled contracts will appear in this section
contractstate.prorejected: The professional has rejected the contract request
contractstate.clientrejected: The client has rejected the contract request
contractstate.clientrescheduled: The client has requested a rescheduling of the contract
contractstate.prorescheduled: The professional has requested a rescheduling of the contract
